00041 string valgrindString2 = ".valgrind.txt ";

00046 class test_regression_copynumber_cyto_quick
00047 {
00048 public:
00049     int numPassed;
00050     int numFailed;
00051     std::string testDir;
00052     std::set<std::string> setIgnore;
00053     std::map<std::string, float> mapEpsilon;
00054     std::vector<std::string> vCytogenetics_Array_SixFiles;
00055 
00056     test_regression_copynumber_cyto_quick()
00057     {
00058         numPassed = 0;
00059         numFailed = 0;
00060 
00061         // Header paramters to ignore
00062         setIgnore.insert("FileCreationTime");
00063         setIgnore.insert("FileIdentifier");
00064         setIgnore.insert("program-version");
00065         setIgnore.insert("create_date");
00066         setIgnore.insert("create-date");
00067         setIgnore.insert("affymetrix-algorithm-param-option-verbose");
00068         setIgnore.insert("affymetrix-algorithm-param-option-exec-guid");
00069         setIgnore.insert("affymetrix-algorithm-param-option-program-cvs-id");
00070         setIgnore.insert("affymetrix-algorithm-param-option-version-to-report");
00071         setIgnore.insert("affymetrix-algorithm-param-option-command-line");
00072         setIgnore.insert("affymetrix-algorithm-param-option-mem-usage");
00073         setIgnore.insert("affymetrix-algorithm-param-option-run-probeset-genotype");
00074         setIgnore.insert("affymetrix-algorithm-param-option-cels");
00075         setIgnore.insert("affymetrix-algorithm-param-option-out-dir");
00076         setIgnore.insert("affymetrix-algorithm-param-state-time-start");
00077         setIgnore.insert("affymetrix-algorithm-param-state-free-mem-at-start");
00078         setIgnore.insert("affymetrix-algorithm-param-option-temp-dir");
00079 
00080         // Data Set columns to ignore (Specify as Group.Set.Column)
00081 //        setIgnore.insert("AlgorithmData.MarkerABSignal.SCAR");
00082 
00083         // Data Set column epsilon override (Specify as Group.Set.Column)
00084 //        mapEpsilon.insert(std::pair<std::string, float>("AlgorithmData.MarkerABSignal.SCAR", (float)0.0005));
00085         mapEpsilon.insert(std::pair<string, float>("Segments.CN.MeanMarkerDistance", 376.0f));
00086         // File tags to check for equivalency
00087         vCytogenetics_Array_SixFiles.push_back("HapMap-As_NA18547_A08_01_NN_20081218");
00088         vCytogenetics_Array_SixFiles.push_back("HapMap-As_NA18603_B03_01_NN_20081218");
00089         vCytogenetics_Array_SixFiles.push_back("HapMap-As_NA18971_C02_01_NN_20081218");
00090         vCytogenetics_Array_SixFiles.push_back("HapMap-Cs_NA10857_A10_01_NN_20081218");
00091         vCytogenetics_Array_SixFiles.push_back("HapMap-Cs_NA12003_D04_01_NN_20081218");
00092     }
00093 
00094     void execute(const std::string& str) {
00095       std::string cmd = Fs::convertCommandToUnc(str);
00096       if (system(cmd.c_str()) != 0) {Err::errAbort("Execution failed for command: " + cmd);}
00097     }
00098 
00099     void equivalency(const std::string& name, const std::string& modifier, std::vector<string>& vFileTags)
00100     {
00101         bool bPassed = true;
00102         AffxString strFileName1;
00103         AffxString strFileName2;
00104         Verbose::out(1, "*");
00105         for(unsigned int i = 0; (i < vFileTags.size()); i++)
00106         {
00107 
00108             strFileName1 = "../../../regression-data/data/idata/copynumber-cyto/" + name + "/" + vFileTags[i] + "." + modifier + ".cychp";
00109             strFileName2 = testDir + "/" + name + "/" + vFileTags[i] + "." + modifier + ".cychp";
00110             if (!Calvin::equivalent(strFileName1, strFileName2, setIgnore, mapEpsilon, 0.0001, 0.9999989, false)) {bPassed = false;}
00111         }
00112         Verbose::out(1, "*");
00113         if (bPassed) {
00114                   Verbose::out(1, "***Passed*** " + name + " vs " + modifier);
00115                   numPassed++;
00116                 }
00117                 else {
00118                   Verbose::out(1, "***Failed*** " + name + " vs " + modifier);
00119                   numFailed++;
00120                 }
00121     }
00122 
00123     void run()
00124     {
00125         single();
00126         batch();
00127     }
00128 
00129     void single()
00130     {
00131           string name = "qt-single";
00132           Fs::rmdirPath(testDir + "/single/", false);
00133 
00134                  execute( valgrindString1 + name + valgrindString2 + " ./apt-copynumber-cyto \
00135                     -v 3 --cyto2 true \
00136                     --force true \
00137                     --text-output true \
00138                     --cnchp-output false \
00139                     --cychp-output true \
00140                     --set-analysis-name ca \
00141                     --reference-input ../../../regression-data/data/idata/lib/Cytogenetics_Array/Cytogenetics_Array.na28.REF_MODEL \
00142                     --snp-reference-input-file ../../../regression-data/data/idata/lib/Cytogenetics_Array/Cytogenetics_Array.na28.snpref.a5 \
00143                     --spf-file ../../../regression-data/data/idata/lib/Cytogenetics_Array/Cytogenetics_Array.spf \
00144                     --chrX-probes ../../../regression-data/data/idata/lib/Cytogenetics_Array/Cytogenetics_Array.chrXprobes \
00145                     --chrY-probes ../../../regression-data/data/idata/lib/Cytogenetics_Array/Cytogenetics_Array.chrYprobes \
00146                     --annotation-file ../../../regression-data/data/idata/lib/Cytogenetics_Array/Cytogenetics_Array.na28.annot.db \
00147                     --probe-file ../../../regression-data/data/idata/lib/Cytogenetics_Array/Cytogenetics_Array.probe_tab \
00148                     --snp-qc-snp-list ../../../regression-data/data/idata/lib/Cytogenetics_Array/Cytogenetics_Array.snplist.txt \
00149                     --cels ../../../regression-data/data/idata/cel/Cytogenetics_Array/HapMap-As_NA18547_A08_01_NN_20081218.CEL \
00150                     --cels ../../../regression-data/data/idata/cel/Cytogenetics_Array/HapMap-As_NA18603_B03_01_NN_20081218.CEL \
00151                     --cels ../../../regression-data/data/idata/cel/Cytogenetics_Array/HapMap-As_NA18971_C02_01_NN_20081218.CEL \
00152                     --cels ../../../regression-data/data/idata/cel/Cytogenetics_Array/HapMap-Cs_NA10857_A10_01_NN_20081218.CEL \
00153                     --cels ../../../regression-data/data/idata/cel/Cytogenetics_Array/HapMap-Cs_NA12003_D04_01_NN_20081218.CEL \
00154                     --out-dir " + testDir + "/single \
00155                     --male-gender-ratio-cutoff=1.3 \
00156                     --female-gender-ratio-cutoff=1.0 \
00157                     --xx-cutoff=0.8 \
00158                     --xx-cutoff-high=1.07 \
00159                     --y-cutoff=0.65 \
00160                     --analysis log2-ratio-cyto2.gc-correction=true.median-autosome-median-normalization=true.median-smooth-marker-count=5.trim-high=2.0.trim-low=-2.5 \
00161                     --analysis kernel-smooth.sigma_span=50 \
00162                     --analysis cn-cyto2.diagonal-weight=0.995.mapd-weight=0.22.min-segment-size=5.hmm-confidence-weight=0.6 \
00163                     --analysis cn-cyto2-gender.cutoff=0.5 \
00164                     --analysis cn-segment \
00165                     --analysis loh-cyto2.lohCNSegSeparation=1000000.minInformation=100.lambdaCritical=8.0 \
00166                     --analysis mosaicism.marker-bandwidth=6000.confidence-window=251 \
00167                     --analysis allele-peaks.step=100.window=250.point-count=128.bandwidth=0.45.cutoff=0.05 \
00168                     --local-gc-background-correction-reference-method pdnn-reference-method \
00169                     --wave-correction-reference-method wave-correction-reference-method.trim=2.0.percentile=0.75.demean=false \
00170                     --local-gc-background-intensity-adjustment-method pdnn-intensity-adjustment-method.predicted-intensity-bin-count=20.gc-bin-count=20.residual-trim=2.0 \
00171                     --image-correction-intensity-adjustment-method high-pass-filter-intensity-adjustment-method.data-block-rows=320.data-block-cols=2015.mini-block-rows=8.mini-block-cols=8.global-smooth-weight=256.local-smooth-weight=64.converged=0.0001 \
00172                     --wave-correction-log2ratio-adjustment-method wave-correction-log2ratio-adjustment-method.bandwidth=101.bin-count=25.wave-count=3 --reference-chromosome=22 \
00173             ");
00174         equivalency("single", "ca", vCytogenetics_Array_SixFiles);
00175     }

00203                     --male-gender-ratio-cutoff=1.3 \
00204                     --female-gender-ratio-cutoff=1.0 \
00205                     --xx-cutoff=0.8 \
00206                     --xx-cutoff-high=1.07 \

00291 
00292 int main(int argc, char* argv[]) {
00293   try {
00294     FsTestDir testDir;
00295     testDir.setTestDir("copynumber/copynumber-cyto-valgrind",true);
00296     
00297     /* Set up the logging and message handlers. */
00298 
00299     ofstream logOut;
00300     string logName;
00301     logName = testDir.asString() + "/test-regression-copynumber-cyto-quick.log";
00302     valgrindString1 = valgrindString1 + testDir.asString() + "/";
00303     
00304     Verbose::out(1, "Log file: " + logName);
00305     Fs::mustOpenToWrite(logOut, logName.c_str());
00306     LogStream log(3, &logOut);
00307 
00308     Verbose::pushMsgHandler(&log);
00309     Verbose::pushProgressHandler(&log);
00310     Verbose::pushWarnHandler(&log);
00311 
00312     Verbose::setLevel(3);
00313     test_regression_copynumber_cyto_quick test;
00314     test.testDir = testDir.asString();
00315 
00316     Verbose::out(1, "Execute regression test: test-regression-copynumber-cyto-valgrind");
00317 
00318     test.run();
00319 
00320     Verbose::out(1, "NumPassed: " + ToStr(test.numPassed) + " NumFailed: " + ToStr(test.numFailed) + " for test-regression-copynumber-cyto-valgrind");
00321     logOut.close();
00322     return test.numFailed != 0;
00323   }
00324   catch(...) {
00325       Verbose::out(1,"Unexpected Error: uncaught exception.");
00326       return 1;
00327   }
00328   return 1;
00329 }
